name: de.jochenheckl.unity.databinding
description:
This package brings DataBinding to unity game objects.

Expose a ViewModel and bind it to your user interface to keep you application code separate and clean.

Make even the largest projects structured, streamlined and easy to maintain.

samples.description: A collection of simple scenes that demonstrate certain aspects of the data binding package.
The finished project you would have created when following the Getting Started Tutorial step by step.
A simple example demonstrating how to use DataBinding with UIToolkit.
